unnormalised: Delhi basindw, sakhaga thaina! IMD (Indian Meteorological Department) aa agan janai baidi di 05/06/2024 simang gormo hababni bwikhango zwngwthwngw dwngwnw thangwng. Giyanijara baikhoyo 48°C hwjwng jakwngnw hwnna gwrbwndwng! Mwnday, bwiya nwinwigwi tandoor jaisene rwjab jabwi.
normalised: Delhi basigrafo, tairao! unnormalised: Gwrbwnwi baidi, gwiywnai bwikhango bwisaiani khela khwlaywi dwngwnw. normalised: Khabwi denga je, monsoon pora baswri hwraijai jaha khelnai thanggwn baisina.
